Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Metropole in Venice (Castello), you'll be minutes from Church of San Zaccaria and St. Mark's Basilica. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of San Zaccaria Waterbus and Naval History Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include babysitting/childcare, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include babysitting/childcare, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Hotel Metropole in Venice (Castello), you'll be minutes from Church of San Zaccaria and St. Mark's Basilica. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of San Zaccaria Waterbus and Naval History Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Church of San Zaccaria - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
San Zaccaria Waterbus - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Naval History Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Venetian Arsenal - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Piccolo Teatro Delle Melodie Veneziane - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Bridge of Sighs - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Querini Stampalia - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Galleria Stampalia - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Library of St Mark's - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Doge's Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Mark's Basilica - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Mark's Clocktower - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Church of San Giorgio Maggiore - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Procuratie Nuove - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
St. Mark's Square - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Metropole is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Metropole is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show & early departures 100% charges apply. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. City Tax to be paid per person by the client directly to the hotel upon Check Out. Extra bed : On Request. Children Policy: On Request. Baby Cot : Up on availability. From;14/04/17-08/05/17,14/05/17-04/07/17 & 30/08/17-31/10/17-10 days before cancellation 50% of stay as penalty with a minimum of 1 night charge. From 27/04/18 until 30/06/18 & 31/08/17 until 31/10/18-10 days before cancellation 50% of stay as penalty with a minimum of 1 night charge.
